-- Get overview of all reports
SELECT 
  rc.id,
  rc.report_name,
  rc.topic,
  rc.is_active,
  array_length(rc.keywords, 1) as keyword_count,
  COUNT(DISTINCT pc.id) as total_content_processed,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
    WHEN pc.processed_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' 
    THEN pc.id 
  END) as content_this_week,
  COUNT(DISTINCT i.id) as total_insights,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
    WHEN i.created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' 
    THEN i.id 
  END) as insights_this_week,
  MAX(pc.processed_at) as last_processed,
  MAX(wr.created_at) as last_report_date
FROM report_configs rc
LEFT JOIN processed_content pc ON rc.id = pc.report_config_id
LEFT JOIN insights i ON rc.id = i.report_config_id
LEFT JOIN weekly_reports wr ON rc.id = wr.report_config_id
GROUP BY rc.id, rc.report_name, rc.topic, rc.is_active, rc.keywords
ORDER BY rc.is_active DESC, insights_this_week DESC;

-- Get recent top insights across all reports
SELECT 
  rc.report_name,
  rc.topic,
  i.title,
  i.summary,
  i.insight_type,
  i.importance_score,
  i.created_at
FROM insights i
JOIN report_configs rc ON i.report_config_id = rc.id
WHERE i.created_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
  AND i.importance_score >= 0.7
ORDER BY i.importance_score DESC, i.created_at DESC
LIMIT 10;

-- Get processing statistics
WITH daily_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    DATE(processed_at) as process_date,
    report_config_id,
    COUNT(*) as items_processed
  FROM processed_content
  WHERE processed_at >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
  GROUP BY DATE(processed_at), report_config_id
)
SELECT 
  process_date,
  SUM(items_processed) as total_processed,
  COUNT(DISTINCT report_config_id) as active_reports,
  json_agg(
    json_build_object(
      'report_id', report_config_id,
      'count', items_processed
    )
  ) as breakdown
FROM daily_stats
GROUP BY process_date
ORDER BY process_date DESC;
